title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 April 2009 - XWiki
content:
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 00:53): arunreddy, arunreddy\_  are you here?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 00:54): take a look at what i found (it's about the friendly datepicker): http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-1448  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 04:45): Drafts.SubmitingApplication was modified by xwiki:XWiki.mrawash - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SubmitingApplication  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 04:45): Drafts.SubmittingApplication was modified by xwiki:XWiki.mrawash - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SubmittingApplication  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 04:45): Drafts.SubmitingApplication was modified by xwiki:XWiki.mrawash (deleted document) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SubmitingApplication

xwikibot - (04/04/2009 04:52): Drafts.SubmittingApplications was modified by xwiki:XWiki.mrawash - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SubmittingApplications  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 04:52): Drafts.SubmittingApplication was modified by xwiki:XWiki.mrawash (deleted document) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Drafts/SubmittingApplication

xwikibot - (04/04/2009 05:02): XWiki.sasderwn was modified by XWiki.sasderwn (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/sasderwn  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 11:04): Design.XWikiOpenOfficeIntegration was modified by xwiki:XWiki.CristinaScheau - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/XWikiOpenOfficeIntegration  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 12:48): Design.XWikiOpenOfficeIntegration was modified by xwiki:XWiki.CristinaScheau (deleted document) - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Design/XWikiOpenOfficeIntegration  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 12:52): XWiki.CristinaScheau was modified by XWiki.CristinaScheau - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/CristinaScheau  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 12:52): XWiki.CristinaScheau was modified by XWiki.CristinaScheau - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/CristinaScheau  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 13:16): XWiki.MartinhoPatricio was modified by XWiki.XWikiGuest (Rollback to version 3.1) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/MartinhoPatricio  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:16): hi marta\_  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:16): around?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:18): any other mentor around? :)  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:20): hi ancutagheorghe  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:20): how's it going?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 13:20): marta\_: Hi  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:20): hey arunreddy  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:20): i was wondering if you found that issue  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:20): i looked for it  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:21): but no success  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 13:21): marta\_ : hey need some help  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:21): arunreddy: ok, tell me  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:21): :)  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:22): ancutagheorghe: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-1491 -- i thought there would be more info  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 13:22): marta\_ : Added one text area to PollMetaClass . How to fetch the text from it.?  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:22): but that was it  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:23): ancutagheorghe: did you find your way around the javadoc?  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:23): arunreddy: that's... not quite what you were supposed to do  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:23): i didn't have time to take a deep look  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:24): i will do this today  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:24): ok  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:24): but i will definitely need your guidance  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:25): because i don't even know where to begin ... i know what i need to do .. but i do not know how to connect my ideas with XWiki  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:25): arunreddy: anyway, in velocity, you can obtain the value of a property like this  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 13:25): marta\_ : Util class has split method so we can make use of it to split the text  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:25): $doc.getObject("Class.Name").getProperty("property\_name").value  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:26): i was thinking about a class which will have methods like : checkEmail() , checkInteger(), etc  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 13:26): marta\_ : Din Get you.!  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:26): hi sdumitriu, is there any way to check if an email is real? i am not refering to the format .. but if it truly exists  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:26): No  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:27): Absolutely no way  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:27): but then a user registers .. does he have to activate his account from email? .. i created one account but i don't exactly remember if i was asked to do so  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:27): when\*  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:28): There's a setting for this  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:28): By default is not activated  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:28): is it active?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:28): oh, ok  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:28): and is it checked if a user is trying to create many accounts using the same email address?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:30): marta\_ did you see what i wrote above about the issue?  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:31): let me look  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:31): oh i see that sdumitriu wanted to fix it  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:32): yes, but i'm sure he won't mind  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:32): :)  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 13:32): XWiki.CristinaScheau was modified by XWiki.CristinaScheau - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/CristinaScheau  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:32): ok, great  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:33): i need guidance :)  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:33): ancutagheorghe: i got that  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:33): :)))  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:33): ancutagheorghe: One of the most important traits a hacker must have is the ability to discover things on his own  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:34): i am not a hacker :P  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 13:34): :)  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:34): we're trying to convince you to take matters in your hands  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:34): ok :D  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:34): try to find the source of the problem  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:35): I guess you don't know the true definition of 'hacker'  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:35): i will do so .. in the worst case i will find several ways not to do something :))  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:35): we'll help, but you need to lead the process  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:35): sdumitriu .. i am just googling it now :D  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:35): http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hacker\_(programmer\_subculture)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:36): then i should be one :P  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:36): ok i will do so, it would take more time, but i will def. learn more things this way ! :D  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 13:36): exactly  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:37): and i am sure i can not distroy anything  .. so it's all safe :d  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:37): The idea is that you remember better, and make stronger mental connections, when you discover things on your own  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:37): i feel like a kid with new toys right now :))  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:38): ok .. i am going to start my expedition now :D .. wish me good luck :D  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:38): We are here to help and guide you, but we can't spoon-feed you  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:39): true enough :D  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:40): To be sure, we're talking about http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-1491 ?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 13:40): yes  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 13:55): ancutagheorghe: How's it going?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:24): sdumitriu : How are the  new objects of a class created in xwiki ?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:30): WDYM?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:35): sdumitriu: "WDYM" ?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:35): What Do You Mean?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:36): Actually Marta gave me a task in Poll Application.  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 14:36): sdumtriu: only now i am starting to work on this, i was away from the computer :  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 14:36): :)  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:37): So you need to know how to create a new object in Velocity?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:37): How to create new objects of a class -- actually in poll application new objects of PollOption Class are created by calling a particular URL --/objectadd/Polls/----  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:38): You can create objects in two ways, using that URL, or in a script, by calling some methods  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:38): For ex : "http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/objectadd/Polls/GSocPoll?classname=Polls.PollOptionClass&Polls.PollOptionClass\_id=5&xredirect=/xwiki/bin/inline/Polls/GSocPoll" something like this..  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:38): ok  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:38): is this general for all.!!   
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:39): Yes  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:39): in case of adding multiple objects..   
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 14:40): arunreddy: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/APIGuide#HAddobjectstoapage  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:40): Can you point me to the documentation.. i went through API docs ... couldnt find it.  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:41): marta\_ : Thanks a lot :)  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:41): That's called collaborative helping :)  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:42): sdumitriu : :)  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:44): Whats the difference between these two methods. Redirecting to Url and creating directly using Script.  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 14:44): Main.WebHome was modified by xwiki:XWiki.sbond15 (Deleted object) - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:44): You need to make a request to that URL!?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:46): It's the difference between calling a method and visiting an URL  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:46): In the existing one it does. But its easy to create new objects inside the same doc with scripting .   
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 14:47): XWiki.XWikiAllGroup was modified by xwiki:XWiki.RaffaelloPelagalli - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiAllGroup  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 14:47): XWiki.sbond15 was modified by XWiki.Sergiu (deleted document) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/sbond15  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:47): Wanted to know the pros and cons using two methods.!!  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 14:47): arunreddy: when you add an object because the user made some action requesting it, you'll usually use the url method  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:47): I hate those that treat xwiki.org as their playground...  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:48): sdumitriu : to me.?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:48): No, sbond15  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:49): marta\_ : Ok  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:49): He caused code.xwiki.org to be unusable by normal registered users  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 14:49): he's a vandal :)  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 14:50): Hope ancuta solves such problems in future :D  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 14:50): ancuta hopes so too :))  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:50): This is hard to detect  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 14:51): what exactly did he do?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 14:51): He was playing with the rights editor  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 14:51): is anyone allowed to modify the main code od XWiki?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 14:52): i thought that was not possible  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 14:55): XWiki.XWikiPreferences was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (deny view right for XWiki.XWikiAllGroup) - http://xoffice.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiPreferences  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 14:55): XWiki.XWikiPreferences was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (clear view right for XWiki.XWikiAllGroup) - http://xoffice.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiPreferences  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 14:59): XWiki.XWikiPreferences was modified by xwiki:XWiki.Sergiu (Deleted object) - http://xoffice.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/XWikiPreferences  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 14:59): XWiki.marta was modified by XWiki.Sergiu (Created WatchList storage object) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/marta  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 15:02): Can you still edit your application? Or is it readonly?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 15:08): GSOC application ?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 15:08): ITs read only  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 15:09): K  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 15:21): sdumitriu : Can i showcase some live examples  in my application . For the idea Google Docs Integration .  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 15:23): arunreddy: What do you mean?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 15:23): Showcase where?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 15:25): sdumitriu: Somewhere in my wiki and point a link to it in the comments. An idea how we can integrate Google Docs.   
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 15:25): Ah, sure  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 15:25): That would be great  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 15:26): thanks a lot.!  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 15:32): i have to go for now, bye byee  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:47): marta\_, sdumitriu isn't part of this what i have to do ?http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/Creating+a+form+with+validation+and+tooltips  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:48): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/DevGuide/Creating+a+form+with+validation+and+tooltips  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 16:48): not necessarily  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 16:48): it would help, but the root of the problem is elsewhere  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 16:49): you'll find your answer if you look carefully at the exception you get when you introduce a value that is not a number in the number field  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:49): for now i am trying to find out as many things as i can about how XWiki works .. and learn how can i integrate everything  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:49): yes i did that and i have some ideas  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:50): ok, i will go back to that path again :D  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:50): thanks  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 16:51): What are the ideas?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:53): can the classes be changed? so then the method gets a string parameter ... to catch the error  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:53): and return a message  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:53): that will be printed on the page  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 16:53): Yes  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 16:54): Can you tell me the name of the class you want to change? :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:54): let me double check ... to avoid giving a silly answer :D  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 16:55): But note that the parameter will always be a string, so the right solution is not to forbid strings...  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:56): but when i will try to parse it .. place it in a try catch syntax  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 16:56): Exactly  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:56): :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:57): hm i am confused about the class ... NumberClass.java ?  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 16:59): yep  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 16:59): and the method?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:59): now i went to javadoc :D  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 16:59): a sec  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 16:59): oki  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:01): BaseProperty fromString(java.lang.String value)   
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 17:02): see? it's not that hard after all :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:02): and in my case it will return a NumberProperty .. which i see it's a subclass of BaseProperty  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:03): yes marta\_ indeed it is not ... i guess i just panicked :P  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:03): i like XWiki .. it's very well structured .. if i pay attention .. it pretty straight forward   
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 17:04): :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:05): thanks a lot !  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 17:06): the next step is to solve the problem, make a patch and attach it in jira to this issue  
marta\_ - (04/04/2009 17:07): to make the work complete :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:12): ok :)  
xwikibot - (04/04/2009 17:48): XWiki.CristinaScheau was modified by XWiki.CristinaScheau (Created WatchList storage object) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/CristinaScheau  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:53): where can i find the NumberClass.java file? i only found .class  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 17:55): You must checkout the sources  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:55): ...?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 17:55): svn co https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/platform/trunks  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:56): ok :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 17:56): thanks  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:13): hi  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:14): alexmaru : hi  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:14): what's new? how is life?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:15): Splitting  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:15): splitting.?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:15): Applications  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:16): Into awful, bad, mediu and good  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:16): are there awful applications?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:16): A few  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:16): sdumitriu: Where is mine.? :D  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:17): Do you really want to know?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:18): sdumitriu: Yeah .. seriously. atleast i will know where i stand..  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:18): Are you sure?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:18): Can make some changes accordingly.   
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:18): awfull ?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:18): So far you're in the good section  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:18): way to go arunreddy ;)  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:19): omg.!!   
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:19): I'm afraid awful applications only have copy/paste the description of the project  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:19): or something like that  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:19): Yeah, mostly  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:20): at least if u have a bad application u did learn something  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:20): We got a pretty interesting application for "Fully Burning on Disk"  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:21): "This program will assist users determining the right set of files for a burning session; so that the last byte on a disk (CD or DVD disks) gets burned."  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:21): :))  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:21): in what category is my application?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:22): No more hints today  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:22): Sorry  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:22): that really can't be good ...  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:22): this can be a hint itself   
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:22): ancutagheorghe I think all the gsocers who were active on the channel and asked questions are in the "good" applications  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:23): :)  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:23): alexmaru: What makes you think YOU're in the good section?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:23): You've been talking too much  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:23): Your application is much too detailed  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:23): That can't be good  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:23): Ya know?  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:23): really?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:23): Nope  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:24): :))  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:24): I'm just mean  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:24): Scaring people  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:24): u did scare me a little  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:24): well you kinda scared me ..  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:24): 10%  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:24): :(  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:24): :))  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 18:24): But alexmaru is right  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:25): ancutagheorghe, from what I've seen u seem really passionate... I'm sure u are in the good applications  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:25): :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:26): alexmaru, thanks :)  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:26): what project did u apply for?  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:26): anti vandalism filters  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:26): uh... that one  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:26): exactly ... that one :)  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:27): :))  
ancutagheorghe - (04/04/2009 18:27): it became a tabu :))  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:30): alexmaru: Whats your idea.?  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:30): do u mean the project I've applied for?  
arunreddy - (04/04/2009 18:32): yeah  
alexmaru - (04/04/2009 18:33): http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/GoogleSummerOfCode/XWikiCrossPlatformWebandDesktopWidget2009

sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:23): Let me check  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:23): its not behaving the same  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:24): \\n which is supposed to be new line delimiter working as a delimiter for character 'n'  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:24): How are you calling it?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:25): Use single quotes instead of double ones  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:25): '\\n'  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:25): #set($options=$xwiki.split($enteredOptions , '\\n'))  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:25): #set($options=$xwiki.split($enteredOptions , "\\n"))  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:26): both not working  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:26): both working the same way.!! taking delimiter as 'n'  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:26): Let me check  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:27): ok  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:31): #set($options=$xwiki.split($enteredOptions , $util.newline))  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:31): ok  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:31): :)  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:31): It's hard to understand how \ works in Velocity...  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:32): thanks a lot.. it works ..!!  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:32): :)  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:32): sdumitriu: is it part of velocity or xwiki api.?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:32): What?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:32): $util.newline?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:33): Oh, don't use $xwiki.split, use $util.split  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:33): $xwiki.split is deprecated  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:33): ok  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:33): sdumitriu : i dont see $util.newline in the xwiki api..  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:34): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/DevGuide/API/xwiki-core-1.8-javadoc.zip/index.html  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:34): Velocity does not have any methods or objects, so anything starting with $ is XWiki  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:34): can you point me to the link  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:34): ok  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:34): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/DevGuide/API/xwiki-core-1.8-javadoc.zip/com/xpn/xwiki/api/Util.html#getNewline()  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:45): arunreddy\_: in velocity, in getXXX() "get" and "()" can be implicit  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:45): so for $util.getNewLine() you can juse write $util.newLine  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:45): $context.getUser() -> $context.user  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:45): etc  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:46): jvelociter : OK..!! i was wondering why Sergiu pointed me to getNewLine ..  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:46): There are several rules for how does Velocity map a name to an actual method  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:46): and api is not case sensitive ?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:46): It is, but the first letter is tried both lower and uppercase  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:46): it is  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:47): ok  
florinciu - (04/04/2009 23:47): ping cristinaS   
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:47): when we use the abreviated form we write the first letter lower case usually  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:49): jvelociter : in the cases where we dont use getXXX() ??  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:49): yep  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:49): It looks better  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:49): $util.Newline looks like C#  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:49): and we don't want that :D  
florinciu - (04/04/2009 23:50): :)  
jvelociter - (04/04/2009 23:50): haha, sorry florinciu ;)  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:50): can some one tell me what this means --  #set($enteredTitle = "$!request.getParameter('title')")  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:50): looks a bit complicated  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:51): Yes  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:51): $! => silent  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:51): whats the need for exclamation mark  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:51): silent ?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:51): Normally, if an expression evaluates to null, it is printed as is  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:52): So if there's no title parameter in the request, without the ! it woul become:  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:52): $enteredTitle is "$request.get...", literally (the value of the string)  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:52): With !, this means that: if something evaluates to null, don't print anything  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:53): OK  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:53): So if there's no title parameter, in the end $enteredTitle would be the empty string  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:53): You should read the velocity reference  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:53): Yep  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:53): http://velocity.apache.org/engine/releases/velocity-1.5/vtl-reference-guide.html  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:56): i was going through this.. it has lots of examples : http://velocity.apache.org/engine/releases/velocity-1.5/user-guide.html  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:57): Yes, that's a nicer documentation  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:57): :)  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:58): sdumitriu : Reviewing Applications ?  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:59): My link is a syntax specification, which is much shorter, but which is very helpful for those like that already know Velocity and need a quick reference  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:59): Sorry, I forgot you're still learning  
sdumitriu - (04/04/2009 23:59): Yes, reviewing  
arunreddy\_ - (04/04/2009 23:59): :)
